style_one.title: Way 1
style_one.description: Wear your TW system strapless; place the openings to both sides of your body. Leave the strips loose on both sides.

style_two.title: Way 2
style_two.description: Wear your TW system strapless; place the openings to both sides of your body. Pull the right and left strings to the desired height, close zippers. Make sure both sides are even.

style_three.title: Way 3
style_three.description: Wear your TW system strapless; place one of the openings 3/4 to the front left side. Pull string to desired height, you may choose to close zipper. For the back, leave the strings loose and close zipper.

style_four.title: Way 4
style_four.description: Wear your TW system strapless; center the openings to the front and back of your body. Pull-up front strings 2‚Äùapprox. For the back leave the strings loose. Close both zippers. *Way 4 sexier, just pull the front and back strings to desired height, and tie a bow. Close both zippers.

style_five.title: Way 5
style_five.description: Wear your TW system on your hip; place the openings to both sides of your body and release both strings on each side.

style_six.title: Way 6
style_six.description: Wear your TW system on your hip; place the openings to both sides of your body. Pull left string to desired height and tie a bow. Leave right side string loose.

style_seven.title: Way 7
style_seven.description: Wear your TW system on your hip; place the openings to both sides of your body. Pull left and right string to desired height and tie a bow. Make sure both sides are even.

style_eight.title: Way 8
style_eight.description: Wear your TW system on your hip; center the openings to the front and back of your body. Pull front strings to desired height. For the back leave the strings loose and close zipper.

style_nine.title: Way 9
style_nine.description: Wear your TW system on your hip; place one of the openings 3/4 to your left leg. Pull front strings to desired height. For the back leave the strings loose and close zipper.

style_ten.title: Way 10
style_ten.description: Wear your TW system strapless; place the openings to both sides of your body. Pull side strings all the way and tie a bow on each side. You may choose to close zippers.

style_eleven.title: Way 11
style_eleven.description: Wear your TW system strapless; center the openings to the front and back of your body. Pull front and back strings all the way and tie a bow. You may choose to close zippers.

style_twelve.title: Way 12
style_twelve.description: Wear your TW system strapless; place one of the openings 3/4 to the front left, pull front and back strings all the way, tie a bow. Close back zipper.
